subject: Is a regression testing framework available?
msgSnippet: I would like to be able to find out which tests that have stopped working between two of our nightly builds (which run a set of JUnit tests). Since we
messageBody:
I would like to be able to find out which tests that have stopped
working between two of our nightly builds (which run a set of JUnit
tests). Since we currently have more than 500 test cases it is
difficult to do this manually. It would of course be easy if the
normal success rate was 100%, but a number of test cases fail since
the implementation is not yet completed. I would like to input two
versions of the JUnit output (which currently is in XML format), and
get a report of what the difference is between the two.

Is there a tool that can help me with this?

/Daniel
